name: domain-analyzer
title: Domain Analyzer
description: Complete domain analysis: DNS, ping, status, whois, geolocation and technologies
author: robert

commands.name: analyze-domain
commands.title: Analyze Domain
commands.description: Complete analysis of a domain with DNS information, ping, whois and more

preferences.name: timeout
preferences.title: Timeout (seconds)
preferences.description: Time limit for DNS queries and ping

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
